name: Elce6026-digital-signal-processing
body:
### Course Schedule
|   Week   |                       Details                       |
|----------|:---------------------------------------------------:|
|    1     |              Introduction and Background            |
|   1-2    |           Discrete-time Signals and Systems         |
|   3-4    |                      Z-transform                    |
|   4-5    |    Discrete-time and Discrete Fourier Transforms    |
|   5-8    |                     Filter Design                   |
|    9     |  Multidimensional Discrete-time Signals and Systems |
|    10    |              Fundamental of Random Signals          |
|    11    |                Waveform Coding Techniques           |
|    12    |      Introduction to Adaptive Signal Processing     |
